document_data.name: Goranathanil
document_data.mainbody: '''Goranathanil''' was a [[fang dragon]] that laired in [[Myth Drannor]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The dragon lived in a cavern beneath the [[Dlabraddath]] district, the entrance of which opened into a ravine over [[Oacenth's Stream]].
